resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

VRADES is a project that started as my bachelor thesis. The title is an abbreviation from the thesis title: " Validation of the recognition of automatically detected emotional states ".\n The application is inspired from other emotion detection apps, by combining several emotional test types with new features such as being able to receive advice based on test results and keeping track of your tests.

Complete the tutorial to get used with our technologies!
Press on the "camera " button to take a picture
Now press on the " gallery " button to detect an emotion from your device\'s gallery
Now you can proceed to the next step!
Press on the down button to start recording your voice

Q. What kind of activities make you happy most usually?
